title: Une roadmap of Web Applications on Mobile

pages.title: Des graphiques et des hommes
pages.description: Features needed to design compelling and smooth user interfaces.

pages.title: Device Adaptation
pages.description: Features needed to create responsive layouts, where content automatically adjusts itself to heterogeneous screens, input mechanisms and other device capabilities.

pages.title: Forms
pages.description: Features needed to build rich forms and optimize user input on devices where text input remains a challenge.

pages.title: Data Storage
pages.description: Technologies available to save state, export content, and integrate data from files and services on the system.

pages.title: Media
pages.description: Features needed to create immersive audio/video experiences on mobile devices.

pages.title: User Input
pages.description: Features needed to engage the user through device-specific interaction mechanisms, such as touch-based interactions, vibration, notifications.

pages.title: Sensors and Local Interactions
pages.description: Hooks to interact with sensors that compose mobile devices, from accelerometers and geolocation sensors to proximity-based communication mechanisms.

pages.title: Network and Communications
pages.description: Interactions with the network to bring the power and immense storage capabilities of the Web to otherwise limited mobile devices.

pages.title: Application Lifecycle
pages.description: Mechanisms to integrate the application with the rest of the system and provide a native-like experience.

pages.title: Payment and Services
pages.description: Features needed to monetize an application, e.g. by integrating easy-to-use in-app purchases.

pages.title: Performance and Tuning
pages.description: Mechanisms to monitor and improve the performances of an application on highly-constrained mobile devices.

pages.title: Security and Privacy
pages.description: Technologies and considerations to guarantee privacy and security on mobile devices that hold some of the user’s most private and confidential data.
